name: Elon Muscowicz: Mars annihilation
description:
!!!!WATCH THE TRAILER BEFORE PLAYING!!!!

Help Elon Muskowicz to die on Mars!

Collect gears, kill martians, build, tranform and kill the Teslowicz boss!

Team Name: Hot Dogs

Gameplay Instructions:

  • Collect gears to upgrade yourself and your abilities.
  • Build gear towers for gear production!
  • Build turrets for defence!
  • Fight Martians!
  • Defend the last Boss!

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - camera control
  • LMB - punch
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint

Upgrade usage:

  • R - build gear tower
  • E - 360 punch
  • Q - Rocket launch
  • F - Build turret
  • RMB - machine gun
  • C - Airstrike

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission:

  • Sounds - from freesound
  • VFX textures - free images on google
  • UI icons - free images on google
  • Textures - substance 
  • Heighmaps from substance share
  • Old Monitor Shader from marketplace
